content:
"Game of Thrones" is a great choice! However, I have to break it to you that there is no new season of "Game of Thrones" coming. The eighth and final season concluded in May 2019.

But don't worry, you can still binge-watch the entire series from start to finish! It's a significant commitment, with 73 episodes across eight seasons, but it's definitely worth it. The show is widely regarded as one of the greatest TV series of all time, and its conclusion was a cultural phenomenon.

As for "The Walking Dead," the show is still ongoing, but it's currently in its 11th and final season. New episodes are airing on AMC, and you can catch up on previous seasons on various streaming platforms.

If you want to finish "Game of Thrones" before diving into "The Walking Dead," you can definitely do so. Here's a rough estimate of the time it would take to binge-watch "Game of Thrones":

* 73 episodes x 50-60 minutes per episode = around 60-70 hours of content
* Assuming 4-6 hours of watching per day, you can finish the series in around 10-15 days

Keep in mind that this is just an estimate, and you should pace yourself to avoid binge-watching fatigue. Take breaks, enjoy the show, and don't hesitate to reach out if you need more recommendations or discussion about the series!
